InterfaceVersion.description: The version of the primary interface protocol (free format)

InterfaceExtension.description: URIs identifying supported extensions to the interface protocol

WSDL.description: URLs of WSDL document(s) describing the interface

SupportedProfile.description: URI(s) identifying supported profiles for the Endpoint

Semantics.description: URL(s) of documents providing human-readable descriptions of the semantics of the Endpoint

Implementor.description: The name of the main organization implementing the Endpoint

ImplementationName.description: The name of the implementation of the Endpoint

ImplementationVersion.description: The version of the implementation of the Endpoint

HealthState.description: The operational status of the Endpoint

HealthStateInfo.description: A human-readable explanation of the HealthState of this Endpoint

ServingState.description: If the endpoint is accepting and serving requests

StartTime.description: The start time of the Service associated with this Endpoint (DateTime_t)

IssuerCA.description: The DN of the CA issuing the certificate presented by this Endpoint

TrustedCA.description: DN(s) of CAs trusted by this Endpoint

DowntimeAnnounce.description: When the next scheduled downtime was announced (DateTime_t)

DowntimeStart.description: When the next scheduled downtime will start (DateTime_t)

DowntimeEnd.description: When the next scheduled downtime will end (DateTime_t)

DowntimeInfo.description: Human-readable of the next scheduled downtime

ServiceID.description: The ID of the Service associated with this Endpoint

ShareID.description: The IDs of the Shares accessible from this Endpoint

AccessPolicyID.description: IDs of AccessPolicies associated with this Endpoint

ActivityID.description: IDs of Activities being managed through this Endpoint
